Comparing Words in the Republican Party's 2024 and 2016/2020 National Platforms

This page visualizes the log-odds ratio of words between the Republican Party’s 2024 and 2016/2020 party platforms. These log-odds scores reflect what words are most statistically overrepresented in the 2024 Platform (largest positive values) vs. the 2016/2020 platform (largest negative values). See Monroe et al. 2008 for details about the method and Jack Hessel’s Python implementation here.
